name: Canine Inversum
description:
Canine Inversum is a 2D platformer-shooter about Woofgang's path from deception to truth: the journey to restore justice and the balance of the world. After the apparent abduction of Woofgang's friend Linkus from the Cat Cult, he sets out to find him and overthrow the insurgency brought out by the enemy cats, traversing through the world of Arcanus, fighting them with his high-tech weapons.

In Neon York City, Woofgang finds himself in the central warehouse of "Evermore Croquette Inc.", the biggest croquette factory in the city, where he is tasked to investigate an explosion and find clues about Linkus' abduction.

Secure the shiny fragment, battle your way through the insurgents, upgrade and restock your weapons, and reach the end.

Along the way you'll find crates that contain croquettes, ammunition, and healing pills. Vendors are also scattered so you can upgrade your weapons and purchase extra ammunition.

If Woofgang's health gets too low, he can enter Wolf Out Mode. In Wolf Out Mode, you can only use punches, but they deal immense damage. 

---
Controls:

[WASD] Move
[Space] Jump / [A/D] + [Space] Wall Jump
[Right Click] Aim / [Left Click] Shoot
[Q] Wolf Out
[H] Heal
[S] + [Space] Descend from Platform
